text: â€œNdithu kutalikitsa ndi kuchedwetsa (mwezi wopatulika kuti usafike mwamsanga), kumaonjezera kusakhulupirira (mwa Allah), zoterozo akusokerezedwa nazo amene sadakhulupirire. Chaka china amauyesa wosapatulika pomwe chaka china amauyesa wopatulika ndi cholinga chokwaniritsa chiwerengero cholingana ndi miyezi yomwe Allah adaipatula kukhala yopatulika. Choncho, chimene Allah adaletsa, amachiyesa chololedwa. Zakometsedwa kwa iwo zochita zawo zoipa. Ndipo Allah sawatsogolera anthu osakhulupirira
